```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(gtrendsR)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r pull-query}
res <- gtrends(c("delta 8 gummies", "delta 8 flower", "delta 8 carts", "delta 8 concentrates"), geo = "US")

#graph of terms/interest over time
plot(res)
```


```{r, data-wrangling}
#Trend over time 
interest_over_time_df <- res$interest_over_time

#Designated Market Area
interest_by_dma_df <- res$interest_by_dma
#Region
interest_by_region_df <- res$interest_by_region
#City
interest_by_city_df <- res$interest_by_city
```
